title: Black screen after launch with sounds and being able to click HELP PLEASE

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: PLEASE HELP ME I CANT PLAY LEAGUE FOR OVER 2 DAYS PLEASE THIS IS WHAT HAPPENS (LINK)

replies.body:
Hey, it's me here! 
Are you on windows 7, 8, etc?
windows 10!
Have you tried launching the league client as an administrator?
jep, i even toggled that it Always runs as adminastrator in the compability settings
Sorry this is delayed, just ate dinner! I'm at a crossroad here because I am a mac user but we can do this. Hold on
dont worry take ur time  i appericiate u taking time to help a stranger!

Here is a solution by another windows 10 user, tell me is this works!

so first thing you will have to do is right click the launcher then, click on Troubleshoot compatibility after, click on recommended setting. it will change the setting for the program. Click Test the program. It probably won't work so click next and click no it didn't fix the problems something like that... then select The program won't display correctly.. and then test the program it will work fine :D
IT WORKED?!
YES IT DID!!!!
AHHHHHH!! Luh you <3 So glad I could help!!!
I LOVE YOU TOO! YOU DESERVE A REWARD ADD ME INGAME SO I CAN GIFT YOU <3333
Actually? :00 I will! You're so kind thanks! I'll add you after this game :D

What is your in game name?

Edit: Just realized you're on a different server than me, so you can't gift and I can't add you :( Oh well xP

oh damn :( 

Hey! the client works but when i want to go ingame after champ select it just shows a black screen with sounds and everything what do i do now!?
Is it better now? I hope
OMG YOU ARE MY HERO PLEASE LET ME KISS YOU XD TYSM DUDE!!!
let's try that!

Thanks for the video!  It looks like you've got a connection problem here preventing you from downloading assets and reaching the patching servers.  Technically, you should be on the updated client at this point but haven't been able to patch.  Go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to restore comms with our services and get your client up to date.  That should fix things up.
UPDATE: I CLICKED SOMETHING IN THE BLACKNES AND IT UPDATED THE LEAGUE ICON TO THE NEW ICON BUT IT STILL DOESNT WORK!!!: http://imgur.com/a/eMMA1
hey there! thanks for the reply! , but i can hear the music playing and i can click in the chat box as my cursor changes if i hover above the things that should be vissable there
Hey you just need to install Visual C ++ 2017
